title: Students Failing in Any Subject
description: The school wants to identify students who need extra help. They need a list of students who have a score of less than 40 in any subject to provide additional support. Write a query to count the number of students who scored less than 40 in any subject with the column name `failing_students`.
hint:
To find those who scored below forty,
Use `OR` in `WHERE`, you'll see quickly.
